Dear crawling people,

I am currently trying to use Heritrix 1.4.0 for library archiving and I
would like to ask some questions on usage:

1) In my current crawl only 1 thread is active of the total 50 which is
too slow. I am using PathScope, BdbFrontier, "delay-factor" set to 0,
"min-delay-ms" 0, "ip-politeness" false. How do I set more toe threads
to work even when downloading only from one or few domains?
If I see right, "Host-valence" is not available in BdbFrontier. Shell I
use different frotier instead?

2) When using limited scopes like DomainScope or PathScope some
documents (like embeds) from outside the scope get downloaded even when
"Preselector/recheck-scope" option is true.
How not to download documents, robots.txt or dns records outside the
scope at all?

Best regards,

Vojtech Brozka
